name: Nature Ceress - Version PC
description:
Nature Ceress is a fun adventure game.
You play as a brave mushroom named Ceress.
He must protect his village from the cursed trees that live around the forest.
Rogg, the chief of the cursed trees, wants to steal the power of the village to do evil, Ceress must stop him.

--- Game Features ---
• Fun
• Unique gaming experience
• Nice music
• Great Graphics and Animations
• Extremely addictive
